abstract: Temasek Holdings, the sovereign wealth fund that bought stakes in Merrill Lynch and Barclays amid the global financial crisis, said it had sold its stake in the Bank of America Corporation.
snippet: Temasek Holdings, the sovereign wealth fund that bought stakes in Merrill Lynch and Barclays amid the global financial crisis, said it had sold its stake in the Bank of America Corporation.
lead_paragraph: Temasek Holdings, the Singapore state-owned sovereign wealth fund that bought stakes in Merrill Lynch and Barclays amid the global financial crisis, said it had sold its stake in the Bank of America Corporation.

headline.main: Temasek Says It Sold Its Stake in Bank of America

abstract: Federal officials have urged banking giant Bank of America to revamp its board and bring in directors with more banking experience, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: U.S. Presses BofA on Board Revamp, Report Says
